content:
cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set loggers 
 Change logging level of a list of loggers of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set loggers <logger_name>=<level>... [flags]
 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for loggers
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set 	 - Change logging levels of Envoy Proxy
